serving_type_descriptions.package: The size of the package when you buy the product.
serving_type_descriptions.bottle: The size of the bottle when you buy the product.
serving_type_descriptions.ts: One table spoon (15ml) of the product.
serving_type_descriptions.te: One tea spoon (5ml) of the product.
serving_type_descriptions.slice: One slice of the product (e. g. applicable for sliced cheese).
serving_type_descriptions.piece: One piece of the product (e. g. applicable for gummy bears).
serving_type_descriptions.bread: How much you use when you eat one bread with this product (e. g. applicable for cream cheese).
serving_type_descriptions.small: One small unit of this product (e. g. one small potato).
serving_type_descriptions.medium: One small unit of this product (e. g. one M egg)
serving_type_descriptions.large: One small unit of this product (e. g. one L egg)
serving_type_descriptions.extraLarge: One small unit of this product (e. g. one XL egg).

personal_info.title: Personal Information
personal_info.privacy_notice: You can enter information about your body here to automatically calculate nutrition goals. All information is voluntary and will never be sent to our servers.

protein.title: Protein
protein.loose_weight_without_muscles_description: 2.8 g/kg/d may be needed to maximize the retention of lean body mass in resistance-trained subjects during hypocaloric periods.

calories.title: Calories

extra_active.title: Extra active
extra_active.description: very hard exercise or physical job

calories.calculated_caption: Calculated by the Mifflin-St. Jeor Equation
calories.calculated_description: Please enter your average daily activity level per week. This factor will be multiplied with the amount of energy your body needs to maintain basic functions like breathing.
calories.calulcation_data_missing: Cannot estimate needed calories. To calculate your Basal Metabolic Rate, we need information about your body

nutrition_goal_overview.not_configured: You can configure your nutrition goal in settings

create_product.title: Create product
create_product.label: Label
create_product.label_description: Please copy the label from the product and include the producer if possible. Tags can be alternatives for searching.

product_contributions.title: Product contributions
product_contributions.contribution_from_you: This contribution was made by you. Thank you ❤

auth.title: Login
auth.login_description: We will send you single use password. We will not save any data about you, especially not your email address.
auth.password_description: Please input the password we sent to your email address

errors.response_no_success: The server responded with code {{status}}. This is likely a bug.
errors.ProductCodeAlreadyExists: There already exists a product with the same code.
